channel.title: Mystix - 317 Loading 602 Economy
channel.description:
This is planning on being a 317 server loading 602 data. We are going to be an economy server, so there will be no commands such as ::master, ::item, etc. available to players.
Mystix currently has a development team of three: Lystuya, Trivium, and Purple Helix.
We are not accepting developer applications as of right now.
Mystix is a continuation of our previous project AdamantScape, which was discontinued and temporarily released to the public earlier this year. Since then, we have scrapped all content we do not plan on using, and have rewritten close to all of our content.
The difference between Mystix and our previous project is that we have decided to branch out into higher revision styles of private servers, bringing in more elements and features to bring more of a variety to your gameplay.
Although Mystix is loading 602 data, our server will not haveli:
[ul][li]Overloads[/li] [li]Extreme Potions in PvP (PvM Use Only)[/li] [li]Hunter, Summoning, or Dungeoneering[/li] [li]Dicing or Mithril Seeds (Player-owned Gambling Games)[/li][/ul]
We do plan on having the following in the game:
[ul][li]Ancient Curses[/li] [li]Extreme Potions for PvM Usage[/li] [li]Chaotic Weapons[/li] [li]Dragon Claws and Dragon Platebody[/li] [li]PvP Armour and Weapons[/li] [li]Ancients Magic including Miasmic Spells[/li] [li]God Wars Dungeon[/li] [li]Balmung[/li] [li]Staff of Light[/li] [li]Inferno Adze[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/magic.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Magic - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v Modern Spellbook Combat Spells[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Modern Spellbook Teleports[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Ancient Spellbook Combat Spells[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Ancient Spellbook Teleports[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Modern Spellbook Non-combat Spells[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Lunar Spellbook Teleports[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Vengeance Spells[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Alchemy Spells[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Entangling, Smoke, Shadow, Blood, and Ice Spells[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Stat-reducing Spells[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/prayer.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Prayer (Normal Prayerbook) - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v All Bones Can Be Buried[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Protect Item Prayer[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Protection Prayers[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Smite[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Death Based Prayers[/li] [li][size=14pt]v All Stat Boosting Prayers[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Stat Restoring Prayers[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/mining.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Mining - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v Pickaxe Animations and Requirements[/li] [li][size=14pt]v All Rocks Can Be Mined[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Rocks Refilling[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Prospecting[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/smithing.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Smithing - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v Smelting Bars[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Smithing Bars[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Ring of Forging[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/fishing.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Fishing - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v All Fish Can Be Caught[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Correct Animations[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Correct Fish Requirements[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Fishing Trawler[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/cooking.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Cooking - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v All Fish Can Be Cooked[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Correct Timers[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Correct Burn Percentage[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Cooking Gauntlets[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Able To Cook On Ranges, Fires, Stoves, etc.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/woodcutting.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Woodcutting - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v Correct Hatchet Animations[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Correct Hatchet Requirements[/li] [li][size=14pt]v All Trees Can Be Cut[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Tree Stumps and Regrowth Timers[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/firemaking.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Firemaking - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v All Logs Able To Be Burned[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Ashes After Log Burns Out[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Correct Burning Timer[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Clipping[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/herblore.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Herblore - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v All Potions Able To Be Made[/li] [li][size=14pt]v First and Secondary Ingredients[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Herb Cleaning[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/thieving.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Thieving - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v Stealing From Stalls[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Pickpocketing NPC's[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/crafting.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Crafting - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v Gem Cutting[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Jewelry Making[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Leather Making[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Leather Tanning[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/runecrafting.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Runecrafting - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v Can Enter Altars With Talismans or Tiaras[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Can Craft All Runes[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Rune Multipliers[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Combination Runes[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Abyss[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Pouches[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/fletching.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Fletching - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v Bow Making[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Arrow Making[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Crossbow Making[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Bolt Making[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Dart Making[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/slayer.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Slayer - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v Easy, Medium, Hard Tasks[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Slayer Gem[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Slayer Points with Actual Interface[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Special Monsters That Require a Certain Slayer Level to Kill[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Equipment Needed To Sustain a Monster[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/items/a/a_key.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Miscellaneous - [/b][size=14pt]100% [ul][li][size=14pt]v Clue Scrolls[/li] [li][size=14pt]v In-game Skill Guides[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Vote System[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Experience Lamps[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Skillcape Emotes[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Doors and Double Doors (Region-loading as well)[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/combat.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Combat - [/b][color=green][size=14pt]60%[/COLOR] [ul][li][size=14pt]v Correct Item Requirements, Item Stats, and Equipment Slots Loading Through XML[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Accurate Weapon Timers[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Special Attacks[/li] [li][size=14pt]X NPC Configurations (Being redone due to newer animations)[/li] [li][size=14pt]X NPC Drops[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/ranged.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Ranged - [/b][size=14pt]80% [ul][li][size=14pt]v Bows and Arrows[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Throwing Weapons[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Crossbows and Bolts[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Ava's Attractor/Accumulator[/li] [li][size=14pt]X Enchanted Bolts[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/agility.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Agility - [/b][size=14pt]0% [ul][li][size=14pt]X Gnome Agility Course[/li] [li][size=14pt]X Wilderness Agility Course[/li] [li][size=14pt]X Brimhaven Agility Course[/li] [li]We do not plan on having agility on the start of the server.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/farming.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Farming - [/b][size=14pt]0% [ul][li][size=14pt]X Herb Planting, Growing, and Harvesting[/li] [li]We do not plan on having farming on the start of the server.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/activities/pest_control/voidknightmace.gif[/img] [b][size=14pt]Minigames - [/b][size=14pt]60% [ul][li][size=14pt]v Duel Arena[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Barrows[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Warrior's Guild[/li] [li][size=14pt]X Pest Control[/li] [li][size=14pt]X Fight Caves[/li][/ul]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/items/a/armadyl_godsword.gif[/img] [b][size=4]Bosses - [/b][size=14pt]60% [ul][li][size=14pt]v King Black Dragon[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Chaos Elemental[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Dagannoth Kings[/li] [li][size=14pt]X Kalphite Queen[/li] [li][size=14pt]X God Wars Dungeon[/li][/ul]
[img]http://www.zybez.net/img/skillimg/prayer/Curse_turmoil.png[/img] [b][size=14pt]Curses - [/b][size=14pt]40% [ul][li][size=14pt]v Protect Item Prayer[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Deflect Prayers[/li] [li][size=14pt]v Turmoil Prayer[/li] [li][size=14pt]X Sap Prayers[/li] [li][size=14pt]X Berserker Prayer[/li] [li][size=14pt]X Leech Prayers[/li] [li][size=14pt]X Wrath Prayer[/li] [li][size=14pt]X Soul Split Prayer[/li] [li]We do not plan on having curses on the start of the server.[/li][/ul]
[I]*Unless we decide differently in the future/make modifications or limitations to a certain feature[/I]
[U][b]Credits:[/b][/U] Lystuya Trivium Revil Purple Helix Arrowzftw (original server base) Cooltext.com Logo and Graphic Generator

item.title: Mystix - 317 Loading 602 Economy
item.dc:creator: @Titanium1 Titanium_
item.description:
@Titanium1 wrote:

Goodluck lystuya. Always a supporter of your projects. I’m titanium from rune-server. Time to go see if you posted this on rune-server yet

Read full topic

item.title: Mystix - 317 Loading 602 Economy
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

This actually looks pretty cool. Good luck. Piece of advice try to shy away from “100% rs skills” and try to design your own desires with them.

Read full topic

item.title: Mystix - 317 Loading 602 Economy
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:2, topic:521479”]I’m sorry, but what is 602? All I see is 474, correct me if I’m wrong. But nonetheless, good luck with it![/quote]When he says, “602 data”, I think he means the character models, animations, some (not all) items, few (not many - if any) maps, etc. You get the point.

Read full topic

item.title: Mystix - 317 Loading 602 Economy
item.dc:creator: @Lystuya Lystuya
item.description:
@Lystuya wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

I’m sorry, but what is 602? All I see is 474, correct me if I’m wrong. But nonetheless, good luck with it!

602 is the RuneScape revision released April 28th, 2010. This is the revision our server will be based around, although we may have some content from previous or future revisions. (Example is Completionist Cape)

Read full topic

item.title: Mystix - 317 Loading 602 Economy
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I’m sorry, but what is 602? All I see is 474, correct me if I’m wrong. But nonetheless, good luck with it!

Read full topic

item.title: Mystix - 317 Loading 602 Economy
item.dc:creator: @Lystuya Lystuya
item.description:
@Lystuya wrote:

This is planning on being a 317 server loading 602 data.
We are going to be an economy server, so there will be no commands such as ::master, ::item, etc. available to players.

Mystix currently has a development team of three: Lystuya, Trivium, and Purple Helix.

We are not accepting developer applications as of right now.

Mystix is a continuation of our previous project AdamantScape, which was discontinued and temporarily released to the public earlier this year. Since then, we have scrapped all content we do not plan on using, and have rewritten close to all of our content.

The difference between Mystix and our previous project is that we have decided to branch out into higher revision styles of private servers, bringing in more elements and features to bring more of a variety to your gameplay.

Although Mystix is loading 602 data, our server will not haveli:

[ul][li]Overloads[/li]
[li]Extreme Potions in PvP (PvM Use Only)[/li]
[li]Hunter, Summoning, or Dungeoneering[/li]
[li]Dicing or Mithril Seeds (Player-owned Gambling Games)[/li][/ul]

We do plan on having the following in the game:

[ul][li]Ancient Curses[/li]
[li]Extreme Potions for PvM Usage[/li]
[li]Chaotic Weapons[/li]
[li]Dragon Claws and Dragon Platebody[/li]
[li]PvP Armour and Weapons[/li]
[li]Ancients Magic including Miasmic Spells[/li]
[li]God Wars Dungeon[/li]
[li]Balmung[/li]
[li]Staff of Light[/li]
[li]Inferno Adze[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Magic - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Modern Spellbook Combat Spells[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Modern Spellbook Teleports[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Ancient Spellbook Combat Spells[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Ancient Spellbook Teleports[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Modern Spellbook Non-combat Spells[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Lunar Spellbook Teleports[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Vengeance Spells[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Alchemy Spells[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Entangling, Smoke, Shadow, Blood, and Ice Spells[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Stat-reducing Spells[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Prayer (Normal Prayerbook) - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v All Bones Can Be Buried[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Protect Item Prayer[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Protection Prayers[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Smite[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Death Based Prayers[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v All Stat Boosting Prayers[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Stat Restoring Prayers[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Mining - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Pickaxe Animations and Requirements[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v All Rocks Can Be Mined[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Rocks Refilling[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Prospecting[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Smithing - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Smelting Bars[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Smithing Bars[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Ring of Forging[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Fishing - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v All Fish Can Be Caught[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Correct Animations[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Correct Fish Requirements[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Fishing Trawler[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Cooking - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v All Fish Can Be Cooked[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Correct Timers[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Correct Burn Percentage[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Cooking Gauntlets[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Able To Cook On Ranges, Fires, Stoves, etc.[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Woodcutting - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Correct Hatchet Animations[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Correct Hatchet Requirements[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v All Trees Can Be Cut[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Tree Stumps and Regrowth Timers[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Firemaking - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v All Logs Able To Be Burned[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Ashes After Log Burns Out[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Correct Burning Timer[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Clipping[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Herblore - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v All Potions Able To Be Made[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v First and Secondary Ingredients[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Herb Cleaning[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Thieving - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Stealing From Stalls[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Pickpocketing NPC’s[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Crafting - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Gem Cutting[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Jewelry Making[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Leather Making[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Leather Tanning[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Runecrafting - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Can Enter Altars With Talismans or Tiaras[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Can Craft All Runes[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Rune Multipliers[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Combination Runes[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Abyss[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Pouches[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Fletching - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Bow Making[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Arrow Making[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Crossbow Making[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Bolt Making[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Dart Making[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Slayer - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Easy, Medium, Hard Tasks[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Slayer Gem[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Slayer Points with Actual Interface[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Special Monsters That Require a Certain Slayer Level to Kill[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Equipment Needed To Sustain a Monster[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Miscellaneous - [size=14pt]100%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Clue Scrolls[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v In-game Skill Guides[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Vote System[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Experience Lamps[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Skillcape Emotes[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Doors and Double Doors (Region-loading as well)[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Combat - [color=green][size=14pt]60%[/COLOR]
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Correct Item Requirements, Item Stats, and Equipment Slots Loading Through XML[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Accurate Weapon Timers[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Special Attacks[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X NPC Configurations (Being redone due to newer animations)[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X NPC Drops[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Ranged - [size=14pt]80%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Bows and Arrows[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Throwing Weapons[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Crossbows and Bolts[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Ava’s Attractor/Accumulator[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X Enchanted Bolts[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Agility - [size=14pt]0%
[ul][li][size=14pt]X Gnome Agility Course[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X Wilderness Agility Course[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X Brimhaven Agility Course[/li]
[li]We do not plan on having agility on the start of the server.[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Farming - [size=14pt]0%
[ul][li][size=14pt]X Herb Planting, Growing, and Harvesting[/li]
[li]We do not plan on having farming on the start of the server.[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Minigames - [size=14pt]60%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Duel Arena[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Barrows[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Warrior’s Guild[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X Pest Control[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X Fight Caves[/li][/ul]

[size=4]Bosses - [size=14pt]60%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v King Black Dragon[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Chaos Elemental[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Dagannoth Kings[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X Kalphite Queen[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X God Wars Dungeon[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Curses - [size=14pt]40%
[ul][li][size=14pt]v Protect Item Prayer[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Deflect Prayers[/li]
[li][size=14pt]v Turmoil Prayer[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X Sap Prayers[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X Berserker Prayer[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X Leech Prayers[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X Wrath Prayer[/li]
[li][size=14pt]X Soul Split Prayer[/li]
[li]We do not plan on having curses on the start of the server.[/li][/ul]

*Unless we decide differently in the future/make modifications or limitations to a certain feature
